revision.text: Possibly: The decisions of the court of session, from its institution till the year 1764. With several decisions since that period, arranged under proper titles, in the form of a dictionary. In five volumes. (London : Printed for the editor, and sold by E. and C. Dilly, London; and Charles Elliot, Edinburgh, M DCC LXXIV. [1774]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2446328~S1
